titleInfo.title: Letter No 2 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Shiraz, to Gilbert More, Acting Secretary to the Government, Commercial Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a communication (not present) from Henry Willock, HM Charg√© d'affaires at the Court of Persia, to Mr Canning concerning trade at Bushire.
